response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many of our customers. Given its quality and unique features, we believe it's worth more than $80. Considering your interest and the value you place on this product, I would like to offer it to you for $120. This price reflects both the product's worth and your personal valuation. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations.", "product_price": 120}
